name: Kreuzberg, Spacious, Quiet, Terrace
summary: Welcome to our classic Altbau Wohnung right between Görly, Schliesy, Kotti & the Spree (Right near everything you MUST see) The Apartment is completely renovated & has everything you will need to make your stay in Berlin an unforgetable experience.
space: The Apt has high ceilings and polished floorboards throughout and a new Kitchen and bathroom.  We love the Apartment and the surrouding area and are sure you will too.  We have everything you may need during your stay from towels to kitchenware to tabletennis bats!!! We also have maps and info on Berlin you are welcome to borrow for your stay.
description: Welcome to our classic Altbau Wohnung right between Görly, Schliesy, Kotti & the Spree (Right near everything you MUST see) The Apartment is completely renovated & has everything you will need to make your stay in Berlin an unforgetable experience. The Apt has high ceilings and polished floorboards throughout and a new Kitchen and bathroom.  We love the Apartment and the surrouding area and are sure you will too.  We have everything you may need during your stay from towels to kitchenware to tabletennis bats!!! We also have maps and info on Berlin you are welcome to borrow for your stay. Inclusions; Private Bedroom Queen Bed ( One fold out sofa Bed 140cm x 200cm and One Matress 160cm x 200cm which can be placed on floor Wireless Internet New kitchen including all extras you may need New Bathroom with towells/soap/shampoo/hairdryer Dishwasher Lots of Sun Roller Blinds Washing machine  Lounge and dining table 2 Extra Bikes for you to use We only rent the Apartment while we are away but w
neighborhood_overview: We are right between Görlitzer Bahnhof, Schlesisches Tor and Kottbusser Tor. With the Spree just one street away. Close by are  Markthalle 9  Mariannenplatz Engelbecken Görlitzerpark Paul-Lincke-Ufer East Side Gallery Oberbaumbrücke  Schlingbrücke Mercedes Benz Arena  Endless bars, Cafes and Clubs
notes: If you are not sure about anything just ask and id be happy to answer your questions.
transit: Bus at the door to Ostbahnhof (direct train to the Airport) Walk to Görlitzer Bahnhof, Schlesisches Tor and Kottbusser Tor Ubahn on the famous U1 line. Or we have 2 bikes you can borrow too!!
access: Inclusions; Private Bedroom Queen Bed ( One fold out sofa Bed 140cm x 200cm and One Matress 160cm x 200cm which can be placed on floor Wireless Internet New kitchen including all extras you may need New Bathroom with towells/soap/shampoo/hairdryer Dishwasher Lots of Sun Roller Blinds Washing machine  Lounge and dining table 2 Extra Bikes for you to use
interaction: We only rent the Apartment while we are away but we have plenty of friends around and can always give tips via wats App!!
house_rules: Just respect the other people living in the Apartment block.
host_about: Hi, I'm Luke, 30, from Sydney. Im now living in Berlin.
